<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 5: End the Encounter](/Rules.aspx?ID=1874)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 578

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Once all armies on a side are routed or destroyed, the encounter ends; see [Victory or Defeat](/Rules.aspx?ID=1875) to determine the final results of the encounter.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
